channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How Leaders Can Incorporate Fun Into Workplace Culture
item.description: Fun isn’t the enemy of productivity, it’s a portal to something deeper—authenticity, connection, and creativity.

item.title: Intel’s CEO just revealed why more layoffs are coming. His memo shows the grim impact of course correction
item.description: In the midst of an ongoing turnaround effort, Intel Corp. reported $12.9 billion in revenue as part of its second-quarter financial results on Thursda...

item.title: 3 cost-conscious fertility startups that are making egg-freezing more accessible
item.description: From price-comparison tools to freezing eggs for free in exchange for donating some.

item.title: Bitcoin slides as Fed rate cut hopes diminish
item.description: Bitcoin's drop below $115,00 is the lowest the cryptocurrency has fallen since July 11.

item.title: New Orleans ‘Trash King’ faces a fight to keep cleaning Bourbon Street
item.description: The mayor fired Sidney Torres IV, and his company, IV Waste, but locals don't want another cleaner: "It’s not even in the same solar system."

item.title: Why the Information Gap in Your Business Is Greater Than Any External Threat
item.description: Most businesses don’t lack information. They just lack visibility into where it lives, how to access it, and who owns it.

item.title: Trump and Jerome Powell have tense exchanges at rare presidential visit to the Fed

item.title: ‘Trump’s trade deals are illegal,’ Piper Sandler warns, predicting a Supreme Court smackdown by June 2026
item.description: The investment bank thinks a 9-0 ruling against Trump is likely. That doesn't mean the tariffs will just go away.

item.title: The Paramount-Skydance merger, worth $8 billion, has been approved the FCC
item.description: The $8.4 billion merger between Paramount Global and Skydance Media won approval from U.S. regulators on Thursday, clearing the way for a sale that ev...

item.title: TikTok reacts to alleged shoplifter detained after 7 hours in Illinois Target
item.description: TikTok has become obsessed with an alleged shoplifter who spent seven straight hours in a Target before being detained by security on her way out. Now...

item.title: Are college athletes employees of their schools? Trump signs executive order asking labor authorities to figure it out
item.description: Trump directed the secretary of labor and the National Labor Relations Board to clarify the status of collegiate athletes through guidance or rules.

item.title: HR exec caught on Coldplay kiss-cam resigns after viral moment

item.title: 1 in 5 Gen-Z Workers Have Quit Jobs for This Surprising Reason
item.description: Ever feel blue on a Sunday because you know Monday is coming? A new study shows Gen-Z is acting on this anxiety.

item.title: Why Successful Leadership Requires You to Build Your Network
item.description: When leaders try to carry it all alone, burnout isn’t just likely—it’s inevitable.
